name: Tank Invaders
description:
** Awarded as Best Mobile Game of SBGames 2013’s Independent Games Festival

A DIFFERENT KIND OF SHOOT 'EM UP
You see the action in first-person and touch the screen where you want to shoot.

ARCADE FEATURES
• Voiced-over frantic action
• Colossal bosses
• Power-ups and upgrades
• Endless waves of enemies
• And Nukes!!!
